text:
To commemorate the International Women’s Day, the Inner Wheel Club of Madurai, in association with Apollo Speciality Hospitals and Fortune Pandiyan Hotel, will conduct a free health camp for women on March 13, Sunday, between 9 a.m. and 1.30 p.m.

Specialists from the Apollo Speciality Hospitals will perform mandatory tests, besides screening the participants for common ailments and cancer, at the camp to be conducted at Fortune Pandiyan Hotel. Dieticians will also recommend the right food to lead a healthy life. Registration for participation can be made at 9965523211 and 98428 29911.
title: Free health camp for women today
